name: t08_loop_heavy
description: Loop-intensive numerical code with nested loops, reductions, and array sweeps. Stresses GCC loop optimizations (unrolling, vectorization, strength reduction) which reshape the CFG differently across O-levels.
oracle_pressure: Heavily optimized loops at O2/O3 produce vectorized or unrolled code whose DWARF line info becomes sparse. Oracle must handle gaps in DW_AT_decl_line coverage within loop bodies and correlate optimized basic blocks back to source loops.
